Norwegian explanation: Kombinasjon av en eller flere oppvarmingsteknologier. Er en andel som summerer seg til 1 innenfor hver kombinasjon av TEK og bygningskategori.
Explanation: Combination of one or more heating technologies. A fraction which adds up to 1 for each combination of TEK and building category.

Norwegian explanation: Oppvarmingsteknologien som dekker majoriteten av oppvarmingsbehovet.
Explanation: The heating technology covering the majority of the heating need.

Norwegian explanation: Oppvarmingsteknologiensom dekker det resterende oppvarmingsbehovet.
Explanation: The heating technology covering the remaining heating need.

Norwegian explanation: Oppvarmingsteknologien som dekker det resterende oppvarmingsbehovet etter grunnlast og spisslast.
Explanation: The heating technology covering the remaining heating need after base and peak load.

Norwegian explanation: Energivaren som brukes avgrunnlasten.
Explanation: The energy carrier used by the base load.

Norwegian explanation: Energivaren som brukes av spisslasten.
Explanation: The energy carrier used by the peak load.

Norwegian explanation: Energivaren som brukes av ekstralasten.
Explanation: The energy carrier used by the tertiary load.

Norwegian explanation: Andelen av varmebehovet som dekkes av grunnlasten.
Explanation: Share of the heating need covered by the base load.

Norwegian explanation: Andelen av varmebehovet som dekkes av spisslasten.
Explanation: Share of the heating need covered by the peak load.

Norwegian explanation: Andelen av varmebehovet som dekkes av ekstralasten.
Explanation: Share of the heating need covered by the tertiary load.

Norwegian explanation: Virkningsgrad, kan være over eller under 1.
Explanation: Efficiency factor, can be smaller or larger than 1

Norwegian explanation: Virkningsgrad, kan være over eller under 1.
Explanation: Efficiency factor, can be smaller or larger than 1.

Norwegian explanation: Virkningsgrad, kan være over eller under 1.
Explanation: Efficiency factor, can be smaller or larger than 1

Norwegian explanation: Oppvarming av varmt vann til tappevannsbruk.
Explanation: Heating of domestic hot water.

Norwegian explanation: Hvilken energivare som brukes til å varme opp varmt tappevann.
Explanation: Energy product used by the heating technology providing hot tap water.

Norwegian explanation: Virkningsgrad for teknologien som brukes til å varme opp varmt tappevann.
Explanation: Efficiency factor for the technology providing hot tap water.

Norwegian explanation: Virkningsgrad for kjølemaskin.
Explanation: Efficiency factor for cooling unit.

Norwegian explanation: Kjølemaskin.
Explanation: Cooling unit.

Norwegian explanation: Direktevirkende elektrisk oppvarming. For eksempel panelovn og vifteovn. Punktoppvarming.
Explanation: Direct resistance heating. For example electric wall heater or convection ovens. Space heating.

Norwegian explanation: Elkjel. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Electric boiler. Water  borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Fjernvarme. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: District heating. Water borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Naturgasskjel. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Natural gas boiler. Water borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Direktevirkende elektrisitet og vedovn. Punktoppvarming.
Explanation: Direct resistance heating and wood stove. Space heating.

Norwegian explanation: Fjernvarme og vedovn. Vannbåren varme og punktoppvarming.
Explanation: District heating and wood stove. Water borne heating and space heating.

English: Heat pump air air – direct resistance heating – wood stove
Norwegian: Luft luft varmepumpe – Direktevirkende elektrisitet – Vedovn
Norwegian explanation: Luft luft varmepumpe, vedovn og panelovn (evt varmekabler). Punktoppvarming.
Explanation: Heat pump air air, wood stove and direct resistance heating. Space heating.

English: Heat pump air air – Direct resistance heating
Norwegian explanation: Luft luft varmepumpe og direktevirkende elektrisitet. Punktoppvarming.
Explanation: Heat pump air air and direct resistance heating. Space heating

English: Heat pump central heating – Electric boiler
Norwegian explanation: Vannbåren varmepumpe (væske – vann eller luft – vann) og elkjel. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Water borne heat pump and electric boiler. Water borne heating.

English: Heat pump central heating – Gas boiler
Norwegian explanation: Vannbåren varmepumpe og fossilkjel. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Water borne heat pump and fossil boiler. Water borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Elkjel og solfanger. Vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Electric boiler and solar collector. Water borne heating.

English: Heat pump central heating – Wood stove
Norwegian explanation: Vannbåren varmepumpe og vedovn. Vannbåren varme og punktoppvarming.
Explanation: Water borne heat pump and wood stove. Water borne heating and space heating.

Norwegian explanation: Samlebetegnelse for luft-vann, væske-vann (bergvarme, jordvarme eller sjøvarme) og ventilasjonsvarmepumpe.
Explanation: Term for different types of heat pumps delivering hot water such as air-water, liquid-water (ground heat, ocean heat) and ventilation heat pumps.
